languages.text: "Когда вас принесли на его стол, обожженн{mf|ого|ую}, прошедш{mf|его|ую} {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}сквозь огонь{/d} — он вас спас. Приемы, которыми он удержал жизнь в вашем теле, были опробованы на обитателях Восьмой Погрузочной. Как и методы избавления от шрамов. Стоили ли их жизни вашей? Почтенный Леттард думал, что стоили".
languages.translation_comment: если игрок ходил через огонь в прологе

traits.locale_text: {n}Обрывок утерянного воспоминания всплывает в вашей памяти: мужчина с пытливым взглядом и кривой от шрама улыбкой латает ужасные раны на вашем теле после того, как вы уверенно ступили в огонь. Именно Леттард Фориус заживил ваши ожоги с помощью целебной мази и пересадки кожи — настолько искусно, что шрамы остались почти незаметны.{/n}

languages.translation_comment: если игрок ходил через огонь в прологе

languages.text: "When you were brought in and placed on his table, burned by the {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}fire you had passed through{/d}, he saved you. The methods he used to keep your body alive had been tested on inhabitants of Loading Bay 8. As had the scar-removing techniques. Were their lives worth yours? The esteemed Lettard thought that they were."
languages.original_text: "Когда вас принесли на его стол, обожженн{mf|ого|ую}, прошедш{mf|его|ую} {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}сквозь огонь{/d} — он вас спас. Приемы, которыми он удержал жизнь в вашем теле, были опробованы на обитателях Восьмой Погрузочной. Как и методы избавления от шрамов. Стоили ли их жизни вашей? Почтенный Леттард думал, что стоили".

traits.locale_text: "When you were brought in and placed on his table, burned by the {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}fire you had passed through{/d}, he saved you. The methods he used to keep your body alive had been tested on inhabitants of Loading Bay 8. As had the scar-removing techniques. Were their lives worth yours? The esteemed Lettard thought that they were."

"When you were brought in and laid down on my table, burned by a fire you had passed through, I saved you. The methods I used to keep your body alive had been tested on inhabitants of Loading Station 8. As had the scar-removing techniques. Were their lives worth yours? I think they were."

"When you were brought in and placed on my table, burned by the fire you had passed through, I saved you. The methods I used to keep your body alive had been tested on inhabitants of Loading Station 8. As had the scar-removing techniques. Were their lives worth yours? I think they were."

"When you were brought in and placed on my table, burned by the fire you had passed through, I saved you. The methods I used to keep your body alive had been tested on inhabitants of Loading Station 8. As had the scar-removing techniques. Were their lives worth yours? I think they were."

"When you were brought in and placed on his table, burned by the {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}fire you had passed through{/d}, he saved you. The methods he used to keep your body alive had been tested on inhabitants of Loading Bay 8. As had the scar-removing techniques. Were their lives worth yours? The esteemed Lettard thought that they were."

"When you were brought in and placed on his table, burned by the {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}fire you had passed through{/d}, he saved you. The methods he used to keep your body alive had been tested on inhabitants of Loading Bay 8. As had the scar-removing techniques. Were their lives worth yours? The esteemed Lettard thought that they were."

"When you were brought in and placed on his table, burned by the {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}fire you had passed through{/d}, he saved you. The methods he used to keep your body alive had been tested on inhabitants of Loading Bay 8. As had the scar-removing techniques. Were their lives worth yours? The esteemed Lettard thought that they were."

languages.text: « Quand vous avez été {mf|amené|amenée} sur sa table, {mf|brûlé|brûlée} par le {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}feu que vous aviez traversé{/d}, il vous a {mf|sauvé|sauvée}. Il a utilisé sur votre corps des méthodes testées sur les habitants de la baie de chargement 8. Idem pour les techniques d'élimination des cicatrices. Leurs vies valaient-elles la vôtre ? L'honorable Lettard en était intimement convaincu. »
languages.original_text: "When you were brought in and placed on his table, burned by the {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}fire you had passed through{/d}, he saved you. The methods he used to keep your body alive had been tested on inhabitants of Loading Bay 8. As had the scar-removing techniques. Were their lives worth yours? The esteemed Lettard thought that they were."

traits.locale_text: « Quand vous avez été {mf|amené|amenée} sur sa table, {mf|brûlé|brûlée} par le {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}feu que vous aviez traversé{/d}, il vous a {mf|sauvé|sauvée}. Il a utilisé sur votre corps des méthodes testées sur les habitants de la baie de chargement 8. Idem pour les techniques d'élimination des cicatrices. Leurs vies valaient-elles la vôtre ? L'honorable Lettard en était intimement convaincu. »

languages.text: «Cuando le trajeron a mi mesa, quemad{mf|o|a} por el {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}fuego que había atravesado{/d}, le salvó. Los métodos que usó para mantenerle con vida habían sido puestos a prueba con los habitantes de la bahía de carga 8, al igual que las técnicas anti-cicatrizantes. ¿Valieron la pena sus vidas para salvar la de usted? En la opinión del venerable Lettard, así fue».
languages.original_text: "When you were brought in and placed on his table, burned by the {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}fire you had passed through{/d}, he saved you. The methods he used to keep your body alive had been tested on inhabitants of Loading Bay 8. As had the scar-removing techniques. Were their lives worth yours? The esteemed Lettard thought that they were."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando le trajeron a mi mesa, quemad{mf|o|a} por el {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}fuego que había atravesado{/d}, le salvó. Los métodos que usó para mantenerle con vida habían sido puestos a prueba con los habitantes de la bahía de carga 8, al igual que las técnicas anti-cicatrizantes. ¿Valieron la pena sus vidas para salvar la de usted? En la opinión del venerable Lettard, así fue».

languages.text: 「あなた様が運ばれて彼のテーブルに置かれたとき、あなた様は{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}通り抜けた火でやけどを負って{/d}いました。あなた様の体の治療に使った技術は、ローディングベイ8の住民で試験済です。傷跡を消す技術も同様に。あの者達の命はあなた様の命の役に立ちましたか…？名誉あるレタードは役に立ったと思ったことでしょう」
languages.original_text: "When you were brought in and placed on his table, burned by the {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}fire you had passed through{/d}, he saved you. The methods he used to keep your body alive had been tested on inhabitants of Loading Bay 8. As had the scar-removing techniques. Were their lives worth yours? The esteemed Lettard thought that they were."

traits.locale_text: 「あなた様が運ばれて彼のテーブルに置かれたとき、あなた様は{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}通り抜けた火でやけどを負って{/d}いました。あなた様の体の治療に使った技術は、ローディングベイ8の住民で試験済です。傷跡を消す技術も同様に。あの者達の命はあなた様の命の役に立ちましたか…？名誉あるレタードは役に立ったと思ったことでしょう」

languages.text: “当您{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}穿越火场{/d}，浑身烧伤，被带到他的手术台上时，是他救了您一命。他用来救您的治疗方法，之前早就在八号货运甲板的居民身上试验过了，去除疤痕的技术也是同样如此。那些人付出了牺牲，但却挽回了您的性命。这么做值得吗？尊敬的莱塔德认为这很值得。”
languages.original_text: "When you were brought in and placed on his table, burned by the {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}fire you had passed through{/d}, he saved you. The methods he used to keep your body alive had been tested on inhabitants of Loading Bay 8. As had the scar-removing techniques. Were their lives worth yours? The esteemed Lettard thought that they were."

traits.locale_text: “当您{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}穿越火场{/d}，浑身烧伤，被带到他的手术台上时，是他救了您一命。他用来救您的治疗方法，之前早就在八号货运甲板的居民身上试验过了，去除疤痕的技术也是同样如此。那些人付出了牺牲，但却挽回了您的性命。这么做值得吗？尊敬的莱塔德认为这很值得。”

languages.text: Als Ihr hereingebracht und auf seinen Tisch gelegt wurdet, verbrannt vom {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}Feuer, das Ihr durchlaufen hattet{/d}, hat er Euch gerettet. Die Methoden, mit denen er Euren Körper am Leben hielt, waren an Bewohnern von Ladebucht 8 getestet worden. Ebenso wie die Techniken zur Entfernung der Narben. Waren ihre Leben das Eure wert? Der geschätzte Lettard dachte, das waren sie.
languages.original_text: "When you were brought in and placed on his table, burned by the {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}fire you had passed through{/d}, he saved you. The methods he used to keep your body alive had been tested on inhabitants of Loading Bay 8. As had the scar-removing techniques. Were their lives worth yours? The esteemed Lettard thought that they were."

traits.locale_text: Als Ihr hereingebracht und auf seinen Tisch gelegt wurdet, verbrannt vom {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}Feuer, das Ihr durchlaufen hattet{/d}, hat er Euch gerettet. Die Methoden, mit denen er Euren Körper am Leben hielt, waren an Bewohnern von Ladebucht 8 getestet worden. Ebenso wie die Techniken zur Entfernung der Narben. Waren ihre Leben das Eure wert? Der geschätzte Lettard dachte, das waren sie.

languages.text: "Sizi {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}içinden geçtiğiniz yangının{/d} alevleriyle yanmış hâlde getirip bu masaya yatırdıklarında canınızı kurtaran da oydu. Bedeninizi yaşatmak için kullandığı yöntemler, tıpkı yara izi yok etme teknikleri gibi 8. Yükleme Bölgesi sakinleri üzerinde denenmişti. Onların hayatı, sizinkine değer miydi? Muhterem Lettard, değdiğini düşündü."
languages.original_text: "When you were brought in and placed on his table, burned by the {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}fire you had passed through{/d}, he saved you. The methods he used to keep your body alive had been tested on inhabitants of Loading Bay 8. As had the scar-removing techniques. Were their lives worth yours? The esteemed Lettard thought that they were."
